title: Slime
desc:
Post 706
- Choose a player.
- Every other player gets frozen.
- Cards that are the color <:black:1106265022453268530> and the color <:inferno:1118594776716021780>, lose all abilities, even if they would somehow not.
- This card can only be played on <:lime:1108048230542999633> or <:green:1106234108042031166> cards.
- This card ignores [708] Super Furnace, no matter what, in all universes, no matter anything that happens.
- If a [708] Super Furnace, and [706] Slime are in play at the same time, refer to 708/706-B, Paradox.
